num2words
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which num2words installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using num2words, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load num2words/0.5.10-GCCcore-10.3.0
```
